description: Set a protect configuration as your account default. You can only have one account default protect configuration at a time. The current account default protect configuration is replaced with the provided protect configuration.

parameters.name: ProtectConfigurationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the protect configuration.

nested_items.name: DefaultProtectConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account default protect configuration.

nested_items.name: DefaultProtectConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the account default protect configuration.
